en:
Our dialogue system supports BBCODE tags
here's a guide about tags: https://docs.godotengine.org/en/3.5/tutorials/ui/bbcode_in_richtextlabel.html?highlight=bbcode#reference

there's also custom tags:
[spd 0.5] - change text speed to 0.5 symbols/frame
[inst 5] - instantly display next 5 symbols
[snd sans] - choose sans soundbit
[wait 60] - delay for 60 frames
[event custom_event_data] - emits custom event with "custom_event_data". Never use this tag pls, it's only for programmers.

[color=gray][inst 13]!!!warning!!![/color]
[spd 0.9][snd sans]fast text with... [wait 60]sans soundbit
[spd 0.1][snd null]slow text without sound bite.
Director, Composer, Writer, Artist, Beta Tester

My sincerest thank you to everyone involved in the making of this project, and to you the player.
Until next time, farewell.

This is a non-profit fangame and all characters are property of Toby Fox. We; the Underfell Asgore team recommend that you play UNDERTALE first, as this game contains spoilers for the original game.

With that being said, we hope you enjoy!
*You must have had an awful journey.
*Especially with some of the real monsters that lurk out there.
*Unfortunately, you will have to face one more tonight.
[event asgore_stand_up][event face_asgore0][wait 150]*When they told me a child managed to live through some of the most treacherous conditions imaginable...
*That they not only survived, but even managed to befriend all who they encountered.
*It had to be another one of his jokes.
*That's why when I realised I would be facing someone so small...
*I didn't deserve it to be true.
[event asgore_turns_away][wait 150]*But... I suppose it won't matter soon.
*I can't allow any of this to stop me.
*All of what you've done can't make up for what's been lost.
*My people and I have waited for too long.
(The king's eyes coldly stare you down, as his body remains as unmoving as stone.)
(You stare back, knowing it could very well be your first and last act of defiance.)
(As your journey draws to a close, you face one final challenge.)

[snd default][center]* You ate the Butterscotch Pie.
TODO MESSAGE ABOUT ASGORE'S ATK
[snd default][center]* You ate the Spider Donut.
[snd default][center]* You ate the Hot Dog...?
[snd default][center]* You ate the Sea Tea.
[snd default][center]* You ate the Junk Food.
[snd default][center]* You ate the Potato Chisps.
[snd asgore][center]* And so, the time has finally come...
[center]* Your sacrifice will not be in vein.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You refused to fight.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You still refused to fight.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]Don't make this harder than it already has to be.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You still refused to fight.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]What do you hope to accomplish?
Heed this from me, young one.
This won't go the way you're hoping.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You still refused to fight.
[center]* [color=red]ASGORE[/color] sees something within you he recognises from his past.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]So naive, just like my daughter when she was younger.
Did you encounter someone named Undyne on your journey?
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You still refused to fight.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]I raised and cared for her as if she were a blood relative.
But as she grew older, I knew I would eventually have to tell her the truth.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* You still refused to fight.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]I wanted her to understand.
I wanted to find a way to take her with me.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]As painful as it was, I knew she had to be exiled.
I couldn’t bare the theatrics of a trial.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]I wish things could have been different.
But thanks to you, now they can be.
Would you like to know why?
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]The numerous determination experiments that my royal scientist conducted…
Made me appreciate how powerful a human [color=red]SOUL[/color] really was.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]Through the power of the determination...
I will give us all a second chance.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]Everyone will be at peace.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]I was the one that ordered the experiments that destroyed countless families.
I made the royal scientist loathe herself.
[event box_dial][snd default][center]* Please don't do this, dad...
All of it can be swept away like a bad dream.
[snd asgore][event enemy_dial]One final act of cruelty to save possibly millions.
This... isn't how it's supposed to end...
And to think I had it in me to destroy humanity...
I really have become pathetic, haven't I...?
Young one, the fighting is over...
[color=gray]* We're all so proud of you...
[color=gray]* But now, it's time for you to join us.
[color=gray]* Come on, before your tea gets cold.
[event face_asgore6]* I missed you all so much…
[event enemy_dial]Is this some sort of joke?
Do you seriously still expect something to happen...
Just because I spilled my guts out to you?
My children must live, even if it kills me!
If you won’t fight, then stand still and die like you’re supposed to!!
